attributes.action: Get endometriosis to be recognised as a serious health condition
attributes.background: Endometriosis is a women’s health condition what causes chronic pain and other complications. I don’t think endometriosis is looked at as serious as it is. It is more than just period pain because I am in pain everyday. Everyone’s is different which people need to understand

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned that the suffering of people with endometriosis is not being taken seriously, but we're not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government to take. 

You might like to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/202334

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
